text: John C. McAvoy was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Ursinus College in Collegeville, Pennsylvania from 1931 to 1937. He was a member for the national championship 1925 Dartmouth Indians football team. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Dartmouth Big Green football players Category:Ursinus Bears football coaches
title: John C. McAvoy
